/* IntkStMap.SelectIntkStList 취수장 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_GAIN_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.GAI_NAM LIKE '%' ||#GAI_NAM#|| '%'
A.WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE#
A.RIV_NAM LIKE '%' || #RIV_NAM# || '%'
A.WRW_CDE = #WRW_CDE#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.FNS_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.FNS_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS FNS_YMD , A.GAI_NAM , A.WSR_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250058' AND DTL_CD = A.WSR_CDE ) AS WSR_NAM , A.WSS_NAM , A.AGA_VOL , A.HGA_VOL , A.PMP_CNT , A.GAI_ARA , A.WRW_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250046' AND DTL_CD = A.WRW_CDE ) AS WRW_NAM , A.WGW_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250069' AND DTL_CD = A.WGW_CDE ) AS WGW_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_GAIN_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.GAI_NAM LIKE '%' ||#GAI_NAM#|| '%'
A.WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE#
A.RIV_NAM LIKE '%' || #RIV_NAM# || '%'
A.WRW_CDE = #WRW_CDE#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* IntkStMap.SelectIntkStDtl 취수장 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.FNS_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.FNS_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS FNS_YMD , A.GAI_NAM , A.WSR_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250058' AND DTL_CD = A.WSR_CDE ) AS WSR_NAM , A.WSS_NAM , A.AGA_VOL , A.HGA_VOL , A.PMP_CNT , A.GAI_ARA , A.WRW_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250046' AND DTL_CD = A.WRW_CDE ) AS WRW_NAM , A.WGW_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250069' AND DTL_CD = A.WGW_CDE ) AS WGW_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_GAIN_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_GAIN_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , FNS_YMD , GAI_NAM , WSR_CDE , WSS_NAM , AGA_VOL , HGA_VOL , PMP_CNT , GAI_ARA , WRW_CDE , WGW_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , decode(length(#FNS_YMD#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '') , #GAI_NAM# , #WSR_CDE# , #WSS_NAM# , #AGA_VOL# , #HGA_VOL# , #PMP_CNT# , #GAI_ARA# , #WRW_CDE# , #WGW_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# )

/* 취수장 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_GAIN_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , FNS_YMD = decode(length(#FNS_YMD#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '') , GAI_NAM = #GAI_NAM# , WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE# , WSS_NAM = #WSS_NAM# , AGA_VOL = #AGA_VOL# , HGA_VOL = #HGA_VOL# , PMP_CNT = #PMP_CNT# , GAI_ARA = #GAI_ARA# , WRW_CDE = #WRW_CDE# , WGW_CDE = #WGW_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
/* 취수장 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_GAIN_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
